CustomField.formula: AND( Associated_Opportunity_Type__c = 'Revenue Opportunity', SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Account.RecordType.Id = '0121a000000VnIa', OR( SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.RecordType.Id = '0121a000000VnAB', SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.RecordType.Id = '0121a000000VnUx' ) )
CustomField.label: Entry Criteria Met for Ind. NFR Disc.
